mapper.select: SELECT u.user_real_name AS userRealName, r.role AS userRole, ut.unit_name AS workingUnit, u.user_tel AS userTel, u.user_sex AS userSex, u.user_birthday AS userBirthday, u.ID AS userID, u.mail_address AS mailAddress FROM `user` AS u, role AS r, unit AS ut WHERE u.user_tel = #{userTel} AND u.role_id = r.role_id AND ut.unit_id = u.unit_id

SELECT u.user_tel AS userTel, u.user_real_name AS userRealName, ut.unit_name AS userUnit, u.user_pic_url AS picAddress FROM `user` AS u, unit AS ut WHERE u.user_tel = #{userTel} AND ut.unit_id = u.unit_id

SELECT u.user_tel AS account, u.user_real_name AS realName, r.role AS userRole, CASE u.is_valid WHEN TRUE THEN '有效' WHEN FALSE THEN '无效' END AS isAccountValid FROM `user` AS u, role AS r, unit AS ut WHERE u.role_id = r.role_id AND ut.unit_id = u.unit_id AND u.user_tel != #{userTel} -- 查询用户单位内人员
AND u.unit_id IN ( SELECT u.unit_id FROM `user` AS u, unit AS ut WHERE u.user_tel = #{userTel} AND u.unit_id = ut.unit_id )
